SEARCH
Package renderer

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
renderer.Camera
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Camera extends Object implements Cloneable
Represents a camera in a 3D space. Uses the Builder design pattern.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Camera.Builder
    Inner Builder class for constructing Camera objects.

    • constructRay

      public Ray constructRay(int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
      Constructs a ray for the given pixel coordinates (i, j).
      Parameters:
      nX - total number of pixels in width
      nY - total number of pixels in height
      j - column index of the pixel (from left to right)
      i - row index of the pixel (from top to bottom)
      Returns:
      a Ray object representing the ray passing through the pixel (i, j)

      public Camera printGrid(int interval, Color color)
      Prints a grid on the image with the specified interval and color.
      Parameters:
      interval - the interval for grid lines
      color - the color of the grid lines
      Returns:
      this Camera instance
      Throws:
      MissingResourceException - if the ImageWriter is missing

    • writeToImage

      public void writeToImage()
      Writes the rendered image to the output using the ImageWriter.
      Throws:
      MissingResourceException - if the ImageWriter is missing

    • castRay

      public void castRay(int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
      Casts a ray through the pixel at the given coordinates (i, j) and writes the result to the image.
      Parameters:
      nX - total number of pixels in width
      nY - total number of pixels in height
      j - column index of the pixel (from left to right)
      i - row index of the pixel (from top to bottom)
      Throws:
      MissingResourceException - if the RayTracer is missing

    • renderImage

      public Camera renderImage()
      Renders the entire image by casting rays through each pixel and writing the results to the image.
      Returns:
      this Camera instance
      Throws:
      MissingResourceException - if the ImageWriter or RayTracer is missing
